description: A simple workflow with one Table Step and one Data Step.
name: Limma_app

steps.name: View
steps.description: Used to define view in a sub workflow.

steps.name: Select export
steps.description: Perform computation on user defined projection.

steps.name: Export
steps.description: Export selected data set to the current project.

steps.name: View 1
steps.description: Used to define view in a sub workflow.

factors.name: Measurement
factors.description:
Select the factor that defines the values to use in the computation.

Example:
* log transform of S100
* log transformed and ComBat Corrected S100
* VSN transformed S100
* VSN transformed and ComBat Corrected S100

factors.name: Group
factors.description:
Select the factor that defines the comparison groups.

Example:
* Test Condition
* Treatment off chip

factors.name: Variable
factors.description:
Select the peptide identifier.

Example:
* ID

factors.name: Supergroup
factors.description:
Select a factor that identifies the Supergroup. Supergroup(s) define each comparison group for which t-tests should be calculated. Leave blank if there is only one comparison group. 

Example:
* Supergroup
* Cell line
* Genotype

factors.name: Observation
factors.description:
Select the factor(s) defining a single value per cell.

Example:
* Barcode and Row
* Barcode and Array
 * Sample Name

factors.name: Pair
factors.description:
Select the factor which defines the pairing.

Example:
* Barcode
* Cell line
* Replicate
* Supergroup
